page.title: 09CHILBOLTON VILLAGE (2)
page.content: THE POST OFFICE PROVIDES ALL THE USUAL SERVICES AND IS NOT THREATENED WITH CLOSURE. THERE ARE 2 POSTAL COLLECTIONS ON WEEKDAYS. THE VILLAGE SHOP IS ON THE SAME PREMISES,AND EMPLOYS 4 PEOPLE, ALL PART-TIME. IT HAS A WIDE RANGE OF BASIC GOODS:-GROCERIES,FROZEN FOOD,SMALL CLOTHING ITEMS,FRESH VEGETABLES,BREAD,MILK AND EGGS,SWEETS AND TOBACCO,AND IS AN OFF-LICENCE. THE GARAGE EMPLOYS 2 PEOPLE FULL-TIME. IT PROVIDES SERVICING AND M.O.T. FOR 20 CARS A WEEK, AND SELLS 600 GALLONS OF PETROL A WEEK. BIKES,LAWN-MOWERS AND GAS HEATERS ARE ALSO SERVICED. GAS CYLINDERS AND CAR-PARTS ARE SOLD. THE CAR SALES ARE HANDLED BY ANOTHER ESTABLISHMENT, WHICH ALSO PROVIDES A RE-SPRAY SERVICE.
